translation.Message_0_Page_0: We can do a lot...<pause> but I think we should start off relatively small.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Skipper.<pause> It's a small settlement south of the Stonecutter's Bridge.<pause> It was one of the first to fall to the infection.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: And guess what? Right next to it in a little valley is a little penguin base.
translation.Message_0_Page_5: But it houses some expensive equipment that the penguins wouldn't want to lose.
translation.Message_0_Page_6: We might also find some clues as to the origin of the virus...
translation.Message_0_Page_7: Blow up the <color=#64c819>"Expensive Equipment"</color> and extract immediately.
translation.Response_1: Sounds dangerous, I'm not ready yet.
